vlive.korean: 이 친구가 하는 얘기는 다 옳아요. She always says the right thing. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [포지션의 12가지 아이러브유] 제 6화 - 목 상태가 안 좋은 재욱

vlive.korean: '만두는 항상 옳아.' 맞아요. "Dumplings are always right" Correct. 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : GAVYNJ's Broadcast
이미 망했어. 그냥 해. - 치즈는 항상 옳아요. 괜찮아요. We screwed it up. Just do it. - Cheese always tastes good. It's OK. 듣기 View video NCT : 💚💚쿤림카페💚💚
vlive.english: We screwed it up. Just do it. - Cheese always tastes good. It's OK.

vlive.korean: [그냥 모모링이 하면 다 옳아] 그냥 사람들이 다 긴 머리 좋아하는 것 같아요. [Momo looks good in anything] I think everyone prefers long hair for me. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 좋은건 크게크게! 모모링도 크게크게🍑 (MOMO’s V in new JYP)

examples.korean: Give him a cigar! 발음듣기 옳아! YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
Don’t scoff—she’s absolutely right. 발음듣기 비웃지 말아요. 그녀가 절대적으로 옳아요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I suppose you're right. I can't disappoint my son. 발음듣기 당신 말이 옳아요. 아들을 실망시킬 수는 없지요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I suppose you're right. I can't disappoint my son. 발음

examples.korean: You’re absolutely right. 발음듣기 네가 전적으로 옳아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
But as I told you earlier, she is always right. 발음듣기 하지만 전에 말했듯이, 엄마 말씀은 항상 옳아. TIMES CORE
examples.english: But as I told you earlier, she is always right. 발음
